settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
Using built-in applicator, swipe product directly onto lips. Reapply as necessary.For a bolder look: apply liner before applying lip tint. Pat product in to set.
For a softer look: apply lip tint and allow to set for 5 minutes – wipe off for a delicate hint of color.

settings.content: Link to return policy

settings.text:
Revolutionary Texture:

  • Color deposits as a uniform gloss and gradually dries down to a cloud-like semi-matte: a hint of sheen glazed over velvet color.
  • Long-lasting Tint: Delicate color pigments and moisturizing ingredients ﬁ ll lip lines with uniform color, maintaining a natural and sensual tone throughout the day.
  • Hybrid Skincare: Appreciated as both a cosmetic and skincare product, this lip tint gives aesthetic color beneﬁts while infusing the lips with moisturization and protection.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
